Title:
Operating Systems Laboratory
Organization and Tools
Body: For example, to compile a C source file named main.c, an assembly listing named lowlevel.s, and the object io.o into an executable named prog1 use xcc in the following way: xcc -o prog1 main.c lowlevel.s io.o For more information about the above options, consult the man pages on the Sun C compiler (cc command).
